_header: To the honour of our blessed lady
Note:
Sometimes with prefatory verses (17 lines beginning, ‘A lytell ragge of rethorike…’); see Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 24.
Title(s): ‘A replycacioun agaynst certaine yong scolars, abiured of late’
Subjects: envoys; satire; occasional verse; religious controversy
_description: John Skelton, ‘A replycacioun agaynst certaine yong scolars, abiured of late’ — 408 lines, including Envoy, chiefly in ‘skeltonics’
